name: No Gun Control
description:
You’re on the top floor of a building.

A GUN is taped to your hand 
and it’s shooting everywhere!

GET OUT OF THE BUILDING
AND DON’T LET IT KILL YOUR COWORKERS

Controls:
Arrows - Moving.
Mouse left click - Continue.
R - Restart level.
F - Fast forward the coworkers.
Space - Pick or leave an item.

You can put an item in front of you by walking in that direction. (Also works diagonally)

Level 4: There are a lot of ways to beat it, try finding the easiest.
